00047   inline const Equation_base& equation() const
00048   {
00049     if (mon_equation.non_nul()==0)
00050       {
00051         Cerr << "\nError in Assembleur_P_VEFPreP1B::equation() : The equation is unknown !" << finl;
00052         Process::exit();
00053       }
00054     return mon_equation.valeur();
00055   };
00056 
00057   int modifier_secmem_elem(const DoubleTab&, DoubleTab&);
00058   int modifier_secmem_som(const DoubleTab&, DoubleTab&);
00059   int modifier_secmem_aretes(const DoubleTab&, DoubleTab&);
00060 
00061 // Methodes du changement de base P0+P1<->P1Bulle
00062   int changement_base() const
00063   {
00064     return (beta!=0);
00065   };
